TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit JsonSerializer extends System.Object
public ref class JsonSerializer abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供将对象或值类型序列化为 JSON 以及将 JSON 反序列化为对象或值类型的功能。

span.span: Provides functionality to serialize objects or value types to JSON and to deserialize JSON into objects or value types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何序列化和反序列化 JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md)。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md).

static member Deserialize : ReadOnlySpan<byte> * Type * System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions -> obj

param.span: 要分析的 JSON 文本。

span.span: The JSON text to parse.

param.name: returnType
param.span: 要转换为并返回的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the object to convert to and return.

param.name: options
param.span: 分析期间用于控制行为的选项。

span.span: Options to control the behavior during parsing.

summary.span: 将表示单个 JSON 值的 UTF-8 编码文本分析为指定类型的实例。

span.span: Parses the UTF-8 encoded text representing a single JSON value into an instance of a specified type.
A representation of the JSON value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何序列化和反序列化 JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md)。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md).

span.span: Parses the text representing a single JSON value into an instance of a specified type.
A representation of the JSON value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 的效率不如使用 UTF-8 方法，因为实现本身就使用 UTF-8。Using a is not as efficient as using the UTF-8 methods since the implementation natively uses UTF-8. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何序列化和反序列化 JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md)。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md).

The JSON is invalid.

span.span: There is remaining data in the string beyond a single JSON value.

static member Deserialize : Utf8JsonReader * Type * System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions -> obj

param.name: reader
param.span: 要从中读取 JSON 的读取器。

span.span: The reader to read the JSON from.

param.name: returnType
param.span: 要转换为并返回的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the object to convert to and return.

param.span: 读取期间用于控制序列化程序行为的选项。

span.span: Options to control the serializer behavior during reading.

summary.span: 从提供的读取器读取一个 JSON 值（包括对象或数组）并将它转换为指定类型的实例。

span.span: Reads one JSON value (including objects or arrays) from the provided reader and converts it into an instance of a specified type.
A representation of the JSON value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `reader` 的 属性为 或 ，则对 的一次调用会使读取器前进，以确定值的开头。If the property of `reader` is or , the reader will be advanced by one call to to determine the start of the value. 此方法完成后，`reader` 将定位到 JSON 值中的最后一个令牌。Upon completion of this method, `reader` will be positioned at the final token in the JSON value. 如果引发了异常，则读取器将重置为在调用方法时它所处的状态。If an exception is thrown, the reader is reset to the state it was in when the method was called. 此方法会创建读取器所处理的数据的副本，因此，不需要在返回此方法之后维护数据完整性。This method makes a copy of the data the reader acted on, so there is no caller requirement to maintain data integrity beyond the return of this method. 用于创建 实例的 在发生冲突时优先于 。The used to create the instance of the take precedence over the when they conflict. 因此，在读取时使用 、和 。Hence, , , and are used while reading. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何序列化和反序列化 JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md)。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to.md).

span.span: is .
The JSON is invalid.
-or-
is not compatible with the JSON.
-or-

exception.span: 无法从读取器中读取值。

span.span: A value could not be read from the reader.

exception.span: 使用的是不受支持的选项。

span.span: is using unsupported options.

param.span: 可能用于取消写入操作的标记。

span.span: A token that may be used to cancel the write operation.

summary.span: 将泛型类型参数指定的类型的值异步转换为 UTF-8 编码的 JSON 文本并将它写入流。

span.span: Asynchronously converts a value of a type specified by a generic type parameter to UTF-8 encoded JSON text and writes it to a stream.

returns.span: 表示异步写入操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
